dict.string:
(* This is an unofficial manager for Caffeine (http://lightheadsw.com/caffeine/) created by Sebastian of Zibity. It is an easy way to toggle Caffeine on and off. Usage: "caff"
If you have any questions or suggestions, please send me a message via my website: http://www.zibity.com
If you want more cool Alfred extensions like these, take a look at http://www.zibity.com/alfred.html for all of my other extensions.
If you like this extension, please consider donating to support the continued development of things like this: http://donate.zibity.com
*) --- SCRIPT BEGINS HERE --- try tell application "Caffeine" if active is false then turn on tell application "Growl" to notify with name "Extension Output" title "Caffeine has been activated." description "Caffeine Manager has activated Caffeine." application name "Alfred" identifier "caff" icon of application "Caffeine" else turn off tell application "Growl" to notify with name "Extension Output" title "Caffeine has been deactivated." description "Caffeine Manager has deactivated Caffeine." application name "Alfred" identifier "caff" icon of application "Caffeine" end if end tell end try
Action me turn Caffeine on or off.
